text: I am struggling with built-in English dictionary for emacs, gedit, overleaf as it does not recognize words such as "holonomic" and "numerics". Grammarly spell checking is close to perfect, but it tends to ignore text with too many latex constructs. My supervisor says he is using notepad++ for spell checking. Do other editors have a better spell checker dictionaries for technical papers?
